name: Ordinary Puzzles
description:
Ordinary Puzzles is a minimalistic open-source mobile puzzle game inspired by Picross and Sudoku. 

The rules are simple:
- Cover each number with a line of that length.
- Cover all the dots of the puzzle with lines.
- Lines can't cross.

And that's it!

Each puzzle has a single solution and can be solved trough logical deduction alone: no trial and error is needed.

Relax and build the lines slowly: don't make a move unless you know it's a safe one.

Get it from the Google Play Store or from the  Apple App Store.
Source-code is available on GitHub.
